channel.title: How to play a desktop client
channel.description:
yo sup i made this tut for a m8 and decided to release on here so ye :)
FIRST DOWNLOAD IT AT: http://uppit.com/q0bcgvrym8f0/overload_pkz_v9_by_ace_v9.rar
STEP.1 DOWNLOAD THE server
STEP.2 download winrar:
(32 bit) http://www.rarlab.com/rar/wrar401.exe
(64 bit) http://www.rarlab.com/rar/winrar-x64-401.exe
STEP.3 WHEN IT FINISHES DOWNLOAD WINRAR INSTALL IT
STEP.4 THEN OPEN THE THE FILE U DOWNLOAD IT SHOULD BE CALLED OVERLOAD PKZ V9 OPEN IT THEN AT THE TOP RITE CORNER IT SAYES EXTRACT DO IT AND THEN PRESS OK
STEP.5 WHEN UR DONE EXTRACTING QUIT IT AND WERE EVER THE FILE IT WAS IT BECOMES A FOLDER NEXT TO IT OPEN IT UP
STEP.5 OPEN IT UP AND CLICK ON RUN.BAT THEN IT LOADS TYPE ANY USERNAME OR PASSWORD THEN LOG IN AND TODA UR ON!
TUT MADE BY LEBOAYMEN....
